activities.name: Maggio dei Monumenti (May of Monuments)
activities.description: Experience Naples' annual cultural festival that opens normally closed historic sites and offers special tours, exhibitions, and performances throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Running throughout May, this festival provides unique access to hidden architectural treasures and special cultural events across Naples.
activities.booking_tips: Some special site visits require advance booking through the official website; free events often fill quickly.

activities.name: Procida Day Trip
activities.description: Visit the colorful island of Procida when spring wildflowers bloom and before summer crowds arrive at this authentically preserved fishing community.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers perfect weather for exploring, with pleasant temperatures and the island's buildings adorned with blooming bougainvillea and jasmine.
activities.booking_tips: Ferries depart regularly from Molo Beverello; no advance booking needed except in peak periods (weekends/holidays).

activities.name: Processione di San Gennaro
activities.description: Witness Naples' most important religious ceremony where the dried blood of the city's patron saint liquefies in what locals consider a miraculous event.
activities.seasonal_notes: The first of three annual ceremonies takes place on the first Saturday of May in Naples Cathedral, drawing thousands of faithful observers.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive very early to secure a spot inside the cathedral; the ceremony begins at 9am but crowds gather beforehand.

activities.name: Ravello Music Festival Opening
activities.description: Experience the beginning of the renowned music festival in the stunning cliffside town of Ravello on the Amalfi Coast, easily accessible from Naples.
activities.seasonal_notes: The festival begins in spring with performances in the spectacular Villa Rufolo gardens overlooking the Mediterranean.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets well in advance through the official website; combine with a day exploring the Amalfi Coast.

activities.name: Naples Underground Spring Tour
activities.description: Explore Naples' fascinating underground network of Greek-Roman aqueducts, tunnels, and cisterns with special spring access to normally restricted areas.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers comfortable temperatures for exploring underground spaces, which maintain a constant temperature year-round.
activities.booking_tips: Book specialized tours in advance through Napoli Sotterranea or other authorized operators; English tours available daily.

activities.name: Capodimonte Garden Picnic
activities.description: Enjoy a picnic in the vast historic parks surrounding the Capodimonte Museum when spring flowers bloom and trees are at their lushest.
activities.seasonal_notes: April and May bring perfect weather for enjoying these royal gardens, with cherry blossoms, magnolias, and other flowering plants in bloom.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed for the park; bring your own picnic supplies or purchase them from shops in the Capodimonte neighborhood.

activities.name: Easter Week Processions
activities.description: Experience Naples' atmospheric Holy Week processions through the historic center, featuring hooded penitents, sacred music, and centuries-old traditions.
activities.seasonal_notes: Holy Week (between late March and late April) brings dozens of religious processions, particularly atmospheric in neighborhoods like Sanit√† and Spanish Quarters.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; ask locally for procession routes and times as they vary by neighborhood and change yearly.

activities.name: Vesuvius Spring Hike
activities.description: Hike to the crater of Mount Vesuvius when spring wildflowers bloom on the volcano's slopes and clear days offer panoramic views of the Bay of Naples.
activities.seasonal_notes: April-June offers ideal hiking conditions with moderate temperatures, wildflowers, and often clearer visibility than summer months.
activities.booking_tips: Access the volcano via public EAV bus from Ercolano Scavi station or book a guided tour from Naples; tickets for the final trail to the crater available on-site.

activities.name: Botanical Garden Tour
activities.description: Explore Naples' historic botanical gardens when spring brings thousands of plants to life in this 15-acre scientific garden founded in 1807.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is peak bloom time at the gardens, with special collections of medicinal plants, cacti, and aquatic plants at their best.
activities.booking_tips: No reservation needed; guided tours available with prior arrangement through the University of Naples.

activities.name: Napoli Teatro Festival Italia
activities.description: Experience this major international performing arts festival featuring theater, dance, music, and circus performances in venues throughout Naples.
activities.seasonal_notes: Running June through July, the festival transforms historic venues, cloisters, and palaces into performance spaces.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance through the festival website; popular performances sell out quickly.

activities.name: Ischia Day Trip
activities.description: Escape the city heat with a visit to the volcanic island of Ischia, famous for its thermal spas, gardens, and beaches.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is perfect for enjoying Ischia's numerous beaches and thermal pools, though July and August bring larger crowds.
activities.booking_tips: Ferries depart regularly from Molo Beverello; book thermal spa visits in advance during peak season.

activities.name: Lungomare Evening Stroll
activities.description: Join locals for the traditional evening passeggiata along Naples' seafront promenade when summer brings outdoor dining, music, and street performers.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings transform the waterfront into a vibrant social scene, with pop-up bars, music, and cooler breezes after sunset.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed; the atmosphere is best between 7-11pm when locals come out after the day's heat.

activities.name: Bagno Elena Beach Club
activities.description: Experience a classic Neapolitan beach day at this historic bathing establishment founded in 1840, offering swimming access in the heart of the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Operating June through September, this is one of Naples' few city beaches, offering a respite from summer heat without leaving town.
activities.booking_tips: Reservations for sun beds recommended, especially on weekends; arrive early in the morning for the best experience.

activities.name: Positano Boat Excursion
activities.description: Take a boat trip along the stunning Amalfi Coast to Positano, with opportunities for swimming in hidden coves and grottoes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers calm seas and perfect swimming conditions, though boats get crowded in peak season (July-August).
activities.booking_tips: Book through authorized operators at Molo Beverello or Mergellina ports; smaller group tours offer better experiences than large boats.

activities.name: Estate a Napoli Festival
activities.description: Experience Naples' summer cultural program featuring outdoor concerts, theater, and cinema in historic venues throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Running June through September, the festival offers cultural events in courtyards, cloisters, and piazzas cooled by evening breezes.
activities.booking_tips: Check the city's official cultural website for the program; some events require advance tickets while others are free.

activities.name: Ferragosto Celebrations
activities.description: Join local festivities for Italy's summer holiday on August 15th, with special events, beach parties, and evening concerts.
activities.seasonal_notes: While many businesses close as Neapolitans leave for vacation, the city organizes special events for those remaining.
activities.booking_tips: Beach clubs and restaurants require advance booking for this national holiday; public events in piazzas are free.

activities.name: Summer Nights at Castel Sant'Elmo
activities.description: Enjoy evening openings at this hilltop medieval fortress, offering spectacular night views over illuminated Naples and cultural events.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings extended evening hours and special events to this panoramic location, offering relief from daytime heat.
activities.booking_tips: Check the castle's official schedule for special events; standard visits don't require advance booking.

activities.name: Underwater Archaeological Park of Baia
activities.description: Explore the submerged ancient Roman resort town through glass-bottom boat tours or snorkeling/diving excursions.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers optimal water clarity and temperature for viewing the underwater ruins of this 'Roman Atlantis.'
activities.booking_tips: Book boat tours or diving experiences through authorized operators in Baia or Naples; accessible via regional train to Fusaro station.

activities.name: Naples Pizza Festival
activities.description: Celebrate Naples' most famous creation at this festival featuring traditional pizzerias, demonstrations, and tastings in the pizza's birthplace.
activities.seasonal_notes: Typically held in September, the festival takes advantage of pleasant autumn temperatures for outdoor dining and pizza-making demonstrations.
activities.booking_tips: Special masterclasses require advance booking; general attendance is free with pay-as-you-go food options.

activities.name: Naples Film Festival
activities.description: Experience international and Italian cinema at this annual festival showcasing new talent and established filmmakers.
activities.seasonal_notes: Usually held in late September/early October, the festival brings premieres and special screenings to historic theaters and cultural venues.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets and festival passes online in advance; some screenings include director Q&A sessions.

activities.name: Vendemmia Experience (Grape Harvest)
activities.description: Participate in the grape harvest tradition in the vineyards of Monte Vesuvio or Campi Flegrei, the volcanic wine regions surrounding Naples.
activities.seasonal_notes: September and early October are harvest months for local grape varieties including Aglianico, Piedirosso, and Falanghina.
activities.booking_tips: Book vineyard tours with harvest experiences through wineries or tour operators; best booked at least two weeks in advance.

activities.name: San Gennaro Miracle (September 19)
activities.description: Witness the most important celebration of Naples' patron saint, when thousands gather in the cathedral to see if the saint's blood liquefies.
activities.seasonal_notes: The September ceremony is the most significant of the three annual blood liquefaction events, followed by days of celebration if the miracle occurs.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive extremely early (6-7am) to secure a spot inside the cathedral; the ceremony begins at 9am.

activities.name: Chestnut Festivals in Campania
activities.description: Experience autumn harvest celebrations in mountain towns surrounding Naples, with roasted chestnuts, local wines, and traditional music.
activities.seasonal_notes: October and November bring chestnut festivals to towns like Scala and Baiano, showcasing this important autumn crop.
activities.booking_tips: Accessible by public transport or organized tours from Naples; no reservations needed but check event dates in advance.

activities.name: Naples Underground Archaeological Season
activities.description: Explore newly opened archaeological sites and special exhibitions as the cultural season begins after the summer break.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings new exhibitions and the opening of recently excavated areas as the academic and cultural calendar resumes.
activities.booking_tips: Book specialized archaeological tours in advance; combination tickets offer better value for multiple underground sites.

activities.name: Pompeii with Fall Crowds
activities.description: Visit the world-famous archaeological site when autumn brings fewer tourists, cooler temperatures, and better conditions for exploration.
activities.seasonal_notes: September through November offers ideal visiting conditions without summer heat and crowds, with fall light enhancing photography.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets online to skip entry lines; consider hiring a guide on-site or joining a tour from Naples.

activities.name: Calcio Napoli Match
activities.description: Experience the passionate atmosphere of a Naples football match at the Diego Armando Maradona Stadium during the fall season.
activities.seasonal_notes: The football season is in full swing during autumn, with pleasant temperatures for outdoor matches.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets through the official SSC Napoli website; international matches and games against major teams sell out quickly.

activities.name: Mushroom Hunting Excursion
activities.description: Join guided mushroom foraging trips in the forests of Monte Faito or other natural areas surrounding Naples.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn rains bring porcini and other prized mushroom varieties to Campania's mountain forests.
activities.booking_tips: Book only with certified mycological guides through environmental associations; tours typically run on weekends September-November.

activities.name: Presepi at San Gregorio Armeno
activities.description: Explore Naples' famous 'Christmas Alley' where artisans create and sell traditional nativity scenes alongside contemporary figurines.
activities.seasonal_notes: While workshops are open year-round, the holiday season (November-January) brings spectacular displays and a festive atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Visit on weekday mornings to avoid extreme crowds; no booking required but guided tours offer insights into the craft's history.

activities.name: New Year's Eve on the Lungomare
activities.description: Experience Naples' famous New Year celebration with concerts, fireworks over the Bay of Naples, and thousands of revelers along the seafront.
activities.seasonal_notes: December 31st brings one of Naples' largest public celebrations, with music stages and midnight fireworks visible from many vantage points.
activities.booking_tips: No booking for public areas; restaurants and hotels with waterfront views require reservations months in advance.

activities.name: Thermal Spas at Ischia
activities.description: Enjoy the therapeutic thermal waters of Ischia island, particularly rewarding during winter when outdoor thermal pools steam in the cool air.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is ideal for thermal experiences, with fewer tourists and the dramatic contrast between hot waters and cool air.
activities.booking_tips: Many hotels offer day packages to their thermal facilities; book through official websites and check winter ferry schedules.

activities.name: Teatro San Carlo Opera Season
activities.description: Experience world-class opera at Europe's oldest continuously active opera house during its winter performance season.
activities.seasonal_notes: The main opera season runs from late autumn through spring, with prestigious productions and internationally renowned performers.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets through the official website months in advance; dress code is formal for evening performances.

activities.name: Winter Sales Shopping
activities.description: Take advantage of Italy's regulated winter sales season with shopping along Via Toledo, in the Chiaia district, and at La Reggia Designer Outlet.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter sales officially begin in early January, offering substantial discounts on Italian and international fashion brands.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; shop early in the sales period for the best selection.

activities.name: Carnival (Carnevale) Celebrations
activities.description: Experience Naples' unique take on Carnival with parades, masks, and traditional celebrations before the beginning of Lent.
activities.seasonal_notes: Falling in February or early March (depending on Easter's date), Carnival brings street festivities and special pastries like chiacchiere.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required for public celebrations; check municipal websites for parade routes and official events.

activities.name: Naples Underground Christmas
activities.description: Discover special Christmas-themed tours of Naples' underground archaeological sites, with unique lighting and seasonal perspectives.
activities.seasonal_notes: Underground spaces maintain constant temperatures year-round, making them a comfortable winter activity with special holiday programming.
activities.booking_tips: Book holiday-themed tours in advance through Napoli Sotterranea and other operators; special evening tours available during December.

activities.name: Winter Day Trip to Capri
activities.description: Experience the famous island in its quietest season, when locals outnumber tourists and the authentic character of Capri emerges.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings peace to this popular destination, with clear air offering spectacular views and many shops and restaurants still open.
activities.booking_tips: Check winter ferry schedules as service is reduced; no need for advance booking but verify weather conditions before departure.

activities.name: Sfogliatella Tasting Tour
activities.description: Warm up with Naples' famous pastries on a self-guided tour of historic pasticcerie specializing in sfogliatella and other sweet specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is perfect for enjoying these flaky, ricotta-filled pastries warm from the oven along with rich Neapolitan coffee.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed; visit traditional spots like Attanasio near the central station and Scaturchio in the historic center.
